moving_average_crossover.name: Moving Average Crossover
moving_average_crossover.description: Generates buy signals when fast MA crosses above slow MA, sell when crosses below

rsi_mean_reversion.name: RSI Mean Reversion
rsi_mean_reversion.description: Buys when RSI is oversold (<30), sells when overbought (>70)

trend_following.name: Trend Following
trend_following.description: Follows trends using price breakouts above recent highs with ATR-based stops
